EmailTemplate.description: Custom email template designed for P1-011
EmailTemplate.name: P1_011 Settlement Delayed Template
EmailTemplate.subject: An update on your Nano home loan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Nano home loan settlement is delayed
{!LEFT(Contact.FirstName,1) + LOWER(RIGHT(Contact.FirstName,LEN(Contact.FirstName)-1))}, We are confirming your request to delay the settlement of your Nano home loan.
When you are ready to proceed with settlement, you can reply to this email or call me on 13 NANO (13 6266).
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Nano Customer Support
CONTACT US 13 NANO (13 6266) • help@nano.com.au
©2020 Nano Lending Pty Ltd ABN 85 628 608 391. Australian Credit Licence 511406.
